title: LG’s promise and Google’s experiments
description: We have a ton of housecleaning to take care of right off the bat including the Moto RAZR, Whatsapp’s dark mode, MWC 2020 and more. Plus, we take a look at LG’s implementation of Android 10 on the LG V50 with dual screen. Speaking of dual screens, Microsoft has some thoughts on how to implement dual screens. Google is experimenting with ways to help you use your phone less, and one of our editors wants you to update apps less often. What’s up with that? Podcast Pick: LG G8x Visit http://www.andauth.co/PodcastPicks Affiliate disclosure: We may receive compensation in connection with your purchase of products via links on this page. The compensation received will never influence the content, topics or posts made on this podcast. Recorded January 23, 2020 Topics Motorola Razr preorders start on January 26 at Verizon Many 2020 Chromebooks will see 8 years of updates WhatsApp dark mode is finally here (for some users) MWC 2020: What to expect Who is BBK, the world's second largest phone manufacturer? Juan Carlos Bagnell - LG V50 on Android 10: New OS, New UX, AND A DESKTOP MODE! Microsoft outlines dual screen possibilities with Surface Duo These Google experimental apps help you develop healthy phone habits Shadowgun War Games is mobile games' version of Overwatch Why you might want to disable automatic app updates on the Play Store The Android Authority podcast is: Adam Doud - @DeadTechnology Jonathan Feist - @JFeist1 / @DroneRushcom Joe Hindy - @ThatJoeHindy Produced by Adam Doud Special appearance by:Juan Carlos Bagnell - @Somegadgetguy www.somegadgetguy.com Check out the other podcasts in our network! The DGiT Daily podcast The SoundGuys Podcast

html:
Jan 25, 2020

We have a ton of housecleaning to take care of right off the bat including the Moto RAZR, Whatsapp’s dark mode, MWC 2020 and more. Plus, we take a look at LG’s implementation of Android 10 on the LG V50 with dual screen. Speaking of dual screens, Microsoft has some thoughts on how to implement dual screens. Google is experimenting with ways to help you use your phone less, and one of our editors wants you to update apps less often. What’s up with that?

Podcast Pick: LG G8x

Visit http://www.andauth.co/PodcastPicks

Affiliate disclosure: We may receive compensation in connection with your purchase of products via links on this page. The compensation received will never influence the content, topics or posts made on this podcast.

Recorded January 23, 2020

Topics

Motorola Razr preorders start on January 26 at Verizon

Many 2020 Chromebooks will see 8 years of updates

WhatsApp dark mode is finally here (for some users)

MWC 2020: What to expect

Who is BBK, the world's second largest phone manufacturer?

Juan Carlos Bagnell - LG V50 on Android 10: New OS, New UX, AND A DESKTOP MODE!

Microsoft outlines dual screen possibilities with Surface Duo

These Google experimental apps help you develop healthy phone habits

Shadowgun War Games is mobile games' version of Overwatch

Why you might want to disable automatic app updates on the Play Store

The Android Authority podcast is:

Adam Doud - @DeadTechnology

Jonathan Feist - @JFeist1 / @DroneRushcom

Joe Hindy - @ThatJoeHindy

Produced by Adam Doud

Special appearance by:
Juan Carlos Bagnell - @Somegadgetguy
www.somegadgetguy.com

Check out the other podcasts in our network!
